description:
Set the name of one or more maps in a file.

Sets the name of one or more maps for metric, shape, label, volume, cifti scalar or cifti label files.  You must specify either -name-file, or -from-data-file, or at least one -map option.  The three option types are mutually exclusive.

data_file.title: data_file
data_file.description: the file to set the map names of

opt_name_file_file.title: opt_name_file_file
opt_name_file_file.description: use a text file to replace all map names: text file containing map names, one per line

opt_from_data_file_file.title: opt_from_data_file_file
opt_from_data_file_file.description: use the map names from another data file: a data file with the same number of maps

index.title: index
index.description: the map index to change the name of

new_name.title: new_name
new_name.description: the name to set for the map

items.description: specify a map to set the name of

map.description: specify a map to set the name of
